vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.8.18
§ Sherebiah = "Jehovah has scorched"
a Levite who assisted Ezra at the reading of the Law and who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
示利比 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華已使成焦土"
一位協助以斯拉宣講律法的利未人, 他也是在和尼希米所訂的公約上簽名的人之一
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
示利比 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华已使成焦土"
一位协助以斯拉宣讲律法的利未人, 他也是在和尼希米所订的公约上签名的人之一

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Neh.10.12
§ Sherebiah = "Jehovah has scorched"
a Levite who assisted Ezra at the reading of the Law and who sealed the covenant with Nehemiah
